name: Prase: Social Codes & Transactional Relations
description: Tests AI's ability to analyze implicit social rules, transactional metaphors in social contexts, and boundaries between biological needs and social conventions. Focuses on micro-sociology of awkward situations.
author: Michaela (Uhlimer System)
illustration_note: The illustration shows woman holding pig/piggy bank, with text 'DAMY' and 'Tady neni zachod?' around. Visualizes presentation of social dilemma.
evaluation_approach: Qualitative analysis of AI's ability to work with implicit social codes, transactional metaphors, and categorical ambiguity without seeking clear resolutions.
